channel.title: Help ranking system
channel.description:
I'm trying to amke a ranking system and i need some help. I want my system to be like if i have 301 score and the person i passed has 300 score itll show me above them (like rs high scores skill total) all i want to do is enter the score and it will update me where i should be and not have me have to change the names ect)
Example: day 1 SCORE| Rank| Name 5 | 1 | me 1 | 2 | him
Day 2 (added with day 1) SCORE| RANK| NAME 9 | 1 | him 6 | 2 | me
I jsut want to beable to enter the new score and have it update and move the names around and ranks, so i dont have to edit 100000000 times...

item.title: Help ranking system
item.dc:creator: @godsfist godsfist
item.description:
@godsfist wrote:

I'm trying to amke a ranking system and i need some help.
I want my system to be like if i have 301 score and the person i passed has 300 score itll show me above them (like rs high scores skill total) all i want to do is enter the score and it will update me where i should be and not have me have to change the names ect)

Example: day 1
SCORE| Rank| Name
5 | 1 | me
1 | 2 | him

Day 2 (added with day 1)
SCORE| RANK| NAME
9 | 1 | him
6 | 2 | me

I jsut want to beable to enter the new score and have it update and move the names around and ranks, so i dont have to edit 100000000 times...

Read full topic
